00034 #include <vector>
00035 #include <sstream>
00036 #include <algorithm>
00037 #include <functional>
00038 #include <cctype>
00039 #include <new>
00040 
00041 #include "cusersmod.h"
00042 #include "vqwww.h"
00043 #include "cgi.h"
00044 #include "cinfodb.h"
00045 
00046 using namespace std;
00047 
00048 const char cusersmod::_id[] = "users";
00049 const char cusersmod::_conf[] = "<users/><desc><users/></desc>";
00050 
00051 const char * cusersmod::conf() {
00052   return ! (sessb.ai.flags &cvq::admin) ? "" : _conf;
00053 }
00054 
00058 cusersmod::cusersmod( cenvironment & env ) : cmod(env) {
00059   modinfo = sessb.ai.flags & cvq::admin ? mi_conf : 0;
00060 }
00061 /***************************************************************************
00062  * 
00063  * *************************************************************************/
00064 void cusersmod::act() {
00065   vector<cinfodb::user_info> users;
00066   vector<cinfodb::user_info>::size_type cnt, i;
00067   vector<cinfodb::user_info>::iterator ptr;
00068   out<< "<mod><users>";
00069   
00070   if( ! idb->user_ls(sessb.ai.dom, users) && users.size() ) {
00071     string uid, act, ver, user_sel;
00072     if ( cgi_var(cgi, "uid", uid) && cgi_var(cgi, "act", act) ) {
00073       cmp.id = uid;
00074       if ( (ptr = find_if(users.begin(), users.end(), cmp)) != users.end() ) {
00075         if ( "r" == act ) {
00076           if ( cgi_var(cgi, "ver", ver) && "1" == ver ) {
00077             if ( vq.user_rm(ptr->user, sessb.ai.dom) ) {
00078               out<< "<cant><rm/></cant>";
00079             } else {
00080               users.erase(ptr);
00081               out<< "<ok><rm/></ok>";
00082             }
00083           } else {
00084             out<<"<ver><rm id=\""<< uid << "\"/></ver>";
00085             goto act_end;
00086           }
00087         }
00088       }
00089     }
00090     for( i=0, cnt = users.size(); i<cnt; ++i )
00091       out<<"<item user=\""<< users[i].user 
00092          <<"\" id=\"" << users[i].id 
00093          <<"\" date_crt=\"" << users[i].date_crt
00094          <<"\" date_exp=\"" << users[i].date_exp << "\"/>";
00095   } else out<< "<cant><get/></cant>";
00096 
00097 act_end:  
00098   out<< "</users></mod>";
00099 }
00100 /**************************************************************************
00101  *  
00102  *  ***********************************************************************/
00103 char cusersmod::run() {
00104   if( ! (sessb.ai.flags & cvq::admin) ) return notme;
00105   
00106   cgicc::const_form_iterator fi = cgi.getElement("conf");
00107   if( fi != env.cgi_end_get() ) {
00108     fi = cgi.getElement("id");
00109     if( fi != env.cgi_end_get() && fi->getValue() == _id ) {
00110       idb.reset(cinfodb::alloc());
00111 
00112       act();
00113       return done;
00114     }
00115   }
00116   return notme;
00117 }
